div.div:
* hpdc is a host that holds primary DC containers
* pdc01 is a container as primary DC
* ens33 on hpdc is a network interface of the hpdc
* if2 on hpdc is a network interface of the pdc01

switch.text: * hpdc is a host that holds primary DC containers...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 230px; margin-left: 322px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
* hbdc is a host that holds backup DC containers
* bdc01 is a container as secondary(backup) DC
* ens33 on hbdc is a network interface of the hbdc
* if2 on hbdc is a network interface of the bdc01

switch.text: * hbdc is a host that holds backup DC containers...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 10px; margin-left: 2px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

b.font: Structure of the Samba AD on docker containers.

switch.text: Structure of the Samba AD on docker containers.
